clinical_history: Pelvic pain with suspected ovarian pathology.
technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Major vessels show hyperechoic waveform on Doppler.
Right kidney demonstrates isoechoic, no hydronephrosis.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 23.99 bpm.
Breast tissue shows mildly thickened lesion measuring 20.14 mm.
Placenta is hypoechoic and normally located.
recommendations: MRI or CT correlation may be helpful.
